title: Five Key Throughlines
notes: Dark navy tech-themed background image. Large white title top-left. Five rounded-rectangle 'card' containers with soft blue glow and thin light-blue stroke; three across top row and two across bottom row centered. Each card contains a simple line icon on the left and a short paragraph on the right in white. Icons can be swapped with brand icon set; keep consistent stroke weight and single-color (white/light-cyan).

nodes.label: CARD 1: Friction is the enemy and creates translation loss and latency.
CARD 2: The enablement hub must be protected from ad hoc work to succeed.
CARD 3: Automated governance is central to prevent uncontrolled tooling bypasses.
CARD 4: The success of this model depends on high-caliber talent investment.
CARD 5: Business outcome is the true scoreboard, not just story points delivered.
